devdoc.author: The Moonbeam Team

addProxy(address,uint8,uint32).details: Register a proxy account for the sender that is able to make calls on its behalf

params.delay: The announcement period required of the initial proxy, will generally be zero
params.delegate: The account that the caller would like to make a proxy
params.proxyType: The permissions allowed for this proxy account

isProxy(address,address,uint8,uint32).details: Checks if the caller has an account proxied with a given proxy type

params.delay: The announcement period required of the initial proxy, will generally be zero
params.delegate: The account that the caller has maybe proxied
params.proxyType: The permissions allowed for the proxy
params.real: The real account that maybe has a proxy

returns.exists: True if a proxy exists, False otherwise

removeProxies().details: Unregister all proxy accounts for the sender

removeProxy(address,uint8,uint32).details: Register a proxy account for the sender that is able to make calls on its behalf

params.delay: The announcement period required of the initial proxy, will generally be zero
params.delegate: The account that the caller would like to remove as a proxy
params.proxyType: The permissions currently enabled for the removed proxy account

devdoc.title: The interface through which solidity contracts will interact with the Proxy pallet
